TMP_DELETE_CONFIRM_MSG: Are you sure you want to delete this template? This will delete related data.
TMP_DELETE_FINAL_WARN_MSG: Warning: This action cannot be undone. Deleting this template will permanently remove all related data. Are you sure you want to continue?
TMP_LOCKED_MSG: This template cannot be edited because it has been used.
TMP_COPY_MSG: Create an editable copy of this template. The copy will be saved as a new draft template.
TMP_FAIL_LOAD_LIST: Failed to load templates. Please try again.
TMP_FAIL_LOAD_DETAIL: Failed to load the full template details.
TMP_ERROR_DUPLICATE_TITLE: A template with this name already exists. Please choose a different name.
TMP_ERROR_VALIDATION: Validation error. Please check your inputs.
TMP_ERROR_SAVE: Error saving template. Please try again.
TEMPLATES.DELETE.TITLE: Confirm Deletion
TEMPLATES.DELETE.MSG: Are you sure you want to delete this template? This action will delete related data.
TMP_FINALIZE_TEXT:
When a template is published, it becomes read-only.
Are you sure you want to publish?

LOGIN.SUBTITLE: Log in to answer questionnaires
LOGIN.ERROR_GENERAL: An error occurred during login. Please try again.

ERRORS.NETWORK: Could not connect to the server. Check your internet connection.
ERRORS.SERVER: A server error occurred. Please try again later.
ERRORS.GENERIC: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
ERRORS.BAD_REQUEST: Invalid request. Please check your input.
ERRORS.RATE_LIMITED: Too many attempts. Please wait before trying again.
ERRORS.TIMEOUT: Request timed out. Please try again.
ERRORS.REQUIRED_FIELDS: Please fill in all required fields.

ANSWERING_QUESTIONNAIRES.TITLE: Answering Questionnaires
ANSWERING_QUESTIONNAIRES.CONTENT: Go to 'Active Questionnaires' and click 'Answer' to begin. Three question types: Multiple Choice, Custom Answer Only, or Mixed. Progress saves automatically.

VIEWING_RESULTS.TITLE: Your Role
VIEWING_RESULTS.CONTENT: You provide responses but cannot view your submitted answers. Teachers can see and analyze all responses for educational insights.

DASHBOARD.TITLE: Overview Dashboard
DASHBOARD.CONTENT: View active questionnaires and completion status. Monitor your assigned questionnaires and view results from completed ones.

RESULT_HISTORY.TITLE: Result History
RESULT_HISTORY.CONTENT: Track how individual students' answers change over time. See progression when students complete the same questionnaire multiple times.

TEMPLATE_MANAGEMENT.TITLE: Templates
TEMPLATE_MANAGEMENT.CONTENT: Create questionnaire blueprints with three question types: Multiple Choice, Custom Answer, or Mixed. Templates must be finalized before use and cannot be edited after. Copy templates to make changes.

ACTIVE_QUESTIONNAIRES.TITLE: Active Questionnaires
ACTIVE_QUESTIONNAIRES.CONTENT: Create groups from finalized templates. Select one teacher, one template, and multiple students. Separate questionnaires are generated for each student-teacher pair.

NAVIGATION.TITLE: Navigation
NAVIGATION.CONTENT: Navigation options depend on your role. Use the profile dropdown (top right) to logout or switch language.

PDF.TITLE: Matrix Questionnaire (Teacher / Student)
PDF.META_NOTE: Questions can have 0–10 options. Only chosen predefined options show an X. If there is an option for own answer, it is shown below.
PDF.NO_OPTIONS_NOTE: No predefined options for this question — use the remarks area below.

RESULT.NO_OPTIONS_AVAILABLE: No options available for this question
RESULT.SCROLL_HINT: Scroll horizontally to see all options →

RESULT_HISTORY.TITLE: Student Result History
RESULT_HISTORY.NO_RESULTS_DESC: No results found for the selected student and questionnaire combination.
RESULT_HISTORY.INSTRUCTIONS: Select a student and questionnaire to view results
RESULT_HISTORY.INSTRUCTIONS_DESC: Use the search fields above to find and select a student and questionnaire template to view the historical results.
RESULT_HISTORY.SELECT_STUDENT_FIRST_DESC: You need to select a student before you can choose a questionnaire template.

ACTIVE_BUILDER.CONFIRM_ANONYMOUS_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to create this anonymous questionnaire? This action will assign the selected template to all chosen participants.
ACTIVE_BUILDER.CONFIRM_EVALUATION_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to create this evaluation questionnaire? This action will assign the selected template to all chosen students and teachers.
